syllabus_info.title: Cambridge International AS & A Level Mathematics

learning_objectives.description: carry out the process of completing the square for a quadratic polynomial ax² + bx + c and use a completed square form
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: e.g. to locate the vertex of the graph of y = ax² + bx + c or to sketch the graph

learning_objectives.description: find the discriminant of a quadratic polynomial ax² + bx + c and use the discriminant
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: e.g. to determine the number of real roots of the equation ax² + bx + c = 0. Knowledge of the term 'repeated root' is included.

learning_objectives.description: solve quadratic equations, and quadratic inequalities, in one unknown
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: By factorising, completing the square and using the formula.

learning_objectives.description: solve by substitution a pair of simultaneous equations of which one is linear and one is quadratic
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: e.g. x + y + 1 = 0 and x² + y² = 25, 2x + 3y = 7 and 3x² = 4 + 4xy.

learning_objectives.description: recognise and solve equations in x which are quadratic in some function of x.
